turn.2: Azuth  Azuth ( ) is a fictional deity in the Forgotten Realms campaign setting of the "Dungeons & Dragons" fantasy role-playing game.
turn.3: What is the deity's role in the campaign setting?
turn.4: He is the god of mages.
turn.5: Is the deity good or evil?
turn.7: What does the deity look like?
turn.8: The appearance of Azuth seems to be somewhat indistinct, he often manifests simply as an elderly voice or shimmering blue luminescence.
turn.9: What is the deity's relationship to magic?
turn.10: Azuth is known as the god of all mages and wizards in the realms.
turn.11: Does the deity have any conflicts?
turn.12: This would seem to make his portfolio conflict with that of Mystra, however she is the goddess of all magic, while Azuth specializes on practitioners of magic.
